LanguageData.CampbellsDisease.stages.2.label: Campbell's disease (hallucinations)
LanguageData.CampbellsDisease.stages.2.description: They want me to hurt myself!
LanguageData.CampbellsDisease.stages.3.label: Campbell's disease (delusions)
LanguageData.CampbellsDisease.stages.3.description: They're everywhere! They try to control my mind! I need to fight them of for all that's good in this world!
LanguageData.CampbellsDisease.stages.4.label: Campbell's disease (catatonic)
